title: Cafe 53
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, International, Delivery, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Offers an impressive variety of vegan choices in oven-baked sandwiches, pita wraps, salads and pastries. The vegan sandwiches are in a separate section of the menu so are easily found. Some of the other vegan choices are hummus and falafel pita wrap and hummus plate. Salads include house, fatoush, spinach and apple and pastries are raspberry/apricot bars, scones, brownies and ginger/molasses cookies. Also serves over 100 flavors of tea and has a full espresso bar.
